com.averos.blutrak.blutraksdk.Bluetooth

Interface BlutrakDevice


  • public interface BlutrakDevice
    Created by hassan on 5/14/2017.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int ERROR_DEVICE_NOT_CONNECTED
      Device is not connected
      static int ERROR_RECEIVE_FAIL
      Failed to receive data from blutrak device
      static int ERROR_SEND_COMMAND_FAIL
      Failed to send command

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addConnectionStateChangeListener(ConnectionStateChangeListener listener)
      Monitor connection state changes
      void addKeyPressListener(KeyPressListener listener)
      Adds a listener to receive key press events sent from Blutrak device
      void connect(boolean keepAlive)
      Connect to Blutrak device
      void disconnect()
      Disconnect Blutrack device
      ConnectionState getConnectionState()
      Returns connection state of blutrak device
      java.lang.String getDeviceAddress()
      Returns Blutrack device MAC address
      java.lang.String getDeviceAlias()
      Returns device alias
      boolean isConnected()
      Return true if device is connected
      void readDeviceInfo(DeviceInformationReadListener deviceInformationReadListener)
      Reads device information from device see DeviceInformationReadListener
      void removeConnectionStateChangeListener(ConnectionStateChangeListener listener)
      Removes ConnectionStateChangeListener listener, in order to remove all listeners use ConnectionStateChangeListener(null)
      void removeKeyPressListener(KeyPressListener listener)
      Removes key press listener, in order to remove all listeners use removeKeyPressListener(null)
      void ring(BlutrakOperationCompleteListener listener)
      Ring Blutrak device
      void sleep(BlutrakOperationCompleteListener listener)
      Sleep blutrak device, this will also disconnect blutrak device and in order to reconnect later press key on blutrak until it beeps than call connect(boolean)
      void stopRinging(BlutrakOperationCompleteListener listener)
      Stop ringing Blutrak device if it is ringing
